name: Speed & Endurance Training
description: Developing explosive speed and the endurance to maintain peak performance.

cards.title: Sprint Mechanics & Acceleration Drills
cards.description: Improving sprint technique for faster acceleration and top speed.
bulletpoints: Enhance knee drive and foot strike efficiency
Use resisted sprints for acceleration training
Perfect arm swing mechanics for better sprint posture

cards.title: Tempo Runs & Energy System Development
cards.description: Building endurance for sustained high-intensity performance.
bulletpoints: Utilize sprint-float-sprint methods for race simulation
Incorporate active recovery drills to prevent fatigue buildup
Balance aerobic and anaerobic training for optimal endurance
